physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Diagnosis of fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva at age three; severe progressive heterotopic ossification of the axial skeletal muscles and associated connective tissues.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Flare-ups of fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva diminished greatly in intensity and frequency during the aplastic anemia episode. After cessation of immunosuppression at age 24, mild flare-ups returned, and by age 35, severe flare-ups occurred in previously uninvolved areas, resulting in extensive ankylosis.
